/* Player profiles */ Changed width size on table entries to make it more compact and changed dashes to "No" to make it clear that BD-Audio is an audio only player profile
/* Player profiles */ Small change in grammar for clarity
/* Player profiles */ Clarified player profile information and added reference
Revert to revision 223440241 dated 2008-07-04 02:24:49 by Ww using [[:en:Wikipedia:Tools/Navigation_popups|popups]]
/* Player profiles */ Made several changes on chart to make it clear that BD-Audio is a seperate audio only profile and that all three video profiles are BD-Video
Updated the number of Blu-ray Disc titles released
/* Blu-ray Disc recordable */ Changed the bit about Blu-ray recorders hitting the market almost simultaneously with players to note that that's only in Japan. Capitalized "blu-ray"; "e.g." -> "i.e.".
made 'Recording speed' a child of 'Technical specifications'
/* History */ changed wording; the DRM used in Blu-ray isn't "secure" (as it's already been broken), it's just "more secure" than CSS
/* Player profiles */ Reworded and corrected spelling on BD-Audio change.
/* Player profiles */ Updated information regarding Blu-Ray Audio discs with reference.
/* Alternative disc technologies */ rmv deleted page (per [[WP:CSD#G12|G12]])
/* Region codes */ Moved region areas to image caption legends -- the two separate tables were unwieldy
/* Blu-ray Disc recordable */ Removed claim that standard CD burners can burn Blu-ray Discs
Added number of Blu-ray Disc titles released in Japan with reference and expanded/moved joint licensing agreement information to ongoing development
Firmware history updated and organized (previous save). Retrieved date updated.
Updated current number of Blu-ray titles available in US, removed uncited info on number of releases in Japan, and provided more information on maximum data rate
/* Region codes */ Removed a claim made without any evidence especially since the highdefdigest website listed several recent Blu-ray titles that were region free
/* Player profiles */changed equal to sign to a hyphen
Date the maintenance tags or general fixes
/* Region codes */ +fact, I really doubt this is correct/true, but let's see
/* Disc structure */ restore info removed long ago which is really rather helpful (see http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Blu-ray_Disc&diff=156260869&oldid=156258798)
Removed paragraph in Blu-ray variants on Total Hi Def since it was never released and instead put a link to the Total Hi Def article in history section
/* BD9/BD5 Blu-ray Disc */ readding first link mentioning bd9/mini bds without aacs in this article. changed by dinjiin by deleting it from old mini BD section and readding other doom9 forums link
this is simpler & better (otherwise the link on laser an easteregg)
